instructions:
Tõlgi järgmised atribuudinimed ja -väärtused eesti keelde.

                            Oluline:
                            - Arvesta toote iseloomu ja kogu läbitöödeldud konteksti (pealkiri, kirjeldus, SEO päringud, KKK), et tõlge vastaks toote tegelikele omadustele.
                            - Säilita mõõtühikud õigel kujul (cm, mm, L, W, V jne) ja arvväärtused; kasuta korrektselt eestikeelseid käändeid ja idiomaatilist sõnajärge.
                            - Ära lisa uusi tähendusi ega väärtusi; tõlgi ainult antud nimesid ja väärtusi.
                            - Iga translation-objekt PEAB sisaldama ka "attr_name" välja. Kui kind == "name", siis kasuta attr_name = source.

                            Tagasta täpselt skeemiga { translations: [ { kind: 'name'|'value', source: string, translated: string, attr_name?: string } ] }.
input: {"items": [{"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Energy consumption for 100 cycles (kWh)", "source": "70"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Water consumption for 1 cycle (l)", "source": "8.9"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Duration for 1 cycle (min.)", "source": "235"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Automatic dosing technology"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Automatic dosing technology", "source": "Yes"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Number of temperatures", "source": "5"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Glass programme", "source": "Yes"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Delay start programme", "source": "Yes"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Type of motor", "source": "Universal"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Automatic door opening at the end of the cycle", "source": "Yes"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Upper spray", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Tub material", "source": "Stainless steel / plastic"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Floor beam", "source": "Light signal on the floor"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Delay function"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Delay function", "source": "Pradžios"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Settings, Pcs", "source": "10"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Minimal height, cm", "source": "82.0"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Maximum height, cm", "source": "88.0"}]}
